query: SELECT COUNT(*) as total, ROUND(AVG(rating), 1) as avg_rating, SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_reply, SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_reply FROM guestReviews;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user c2qSkVB4gKtEmor.991468648419 --database 4ExKc24KNHdr4pKbTUzsoU --execute SELECT COUNT(*) as total, ROUND(AVG(rating), 1) as avg_rating, SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as with_reply, SUM(CASE WHEN hasReply = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending_reply FROM guestReviews;
